system.description: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with Investigation, Insight, and Perception, and you gain an expertise die on checks made using any of these skills. For you, expertise dice in these skills can be upgraded from d8 to d10, exceeding the usual limit on expertise dice.
